Attacks.Name: Flamethrower
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Burn special condition.

Attacks.Name: Air Slash
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target character gains the Stagger special condition.

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight, and the defending character does not benefit from cover.

Superpowers.Name: Drought
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of the round, all Fire-type attacks made by this character or allied characters within Range 3 gain an additional die.

Superpowers.Name: Tough Claws
Superpowers.Effect: This character adds 1 die to its attack rolls when targeting an enemy character within Range 2.

Superpowers.Name: Heat Wave
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within Range 2 of this character gain the Incinerate special condition.

Attacks.Name: Blast Burn
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character cannot make any attacks during its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Drought
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of the round, all Fire-type attacks made by this character or allied characters within Range 3 gain an additional die.
